subtitleNullable: This dataset contains movies upto Nov 2020 scrapped using TMDB API
descriptionNullable:
### Context

These files contain metadata for all 58,000+ movies listed in [The Movie Database](https://www.themoviedb.org). The dataset consists of movies released on or before November 2020. Data points include Title, Genre(s), Poster, Keywords and is sorted by Popularity. 

### Content

This dataset contains a single CSV file, ```moviesTMDB2020.csv```.
Since I created this dataset for making a Content-Based  Recommendation Engine, it has the following columns:
* ```id```: TMDB ID of the movie
* ```original_title```: Title of the movie
* ```poster_path```: Path to Poster of the movie
* ```Overview```: Brief Description of the movie
* ```Genre```: Genre(s) the movie belongs to
